entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
